thread.title: #Daydream: Lake Tahoe for the 4th of July
thread.title_full: #Daydream: Lake Tahoe for the 4th of July

title: #Daydream: Lake Tahoe for the 4th of July
text:
#Daydream: Lake Tahoe for the 4th of July Photo by Steve Dunleavy July 3, 2015 
We know how it is. You’re stuck at your desk and the day seems to be going on forever. Your mind start s to wander — at first to “anywhere but here,” but then to exotic, faraway lands where your everyday problems and stress melt in the presence of true paradise. You want to go to there, and we want to go with you. Every day at 3 p.m. Eastern, we’ll send you a picture of the place we at Yahoo Travel are daydreaming about so we can all take that mental vacation together. Let’s go to… 
Photo: Steve Dunleavy/Flickr 
…Lake Tahoe! Celebrating Independence Day on one of the most beautiful lakes in America is a treat. Spend the day with loved ones hiking and swimming. Have an epic BBQ that will be talked about for years to come, and then gather to watch the fireworks down by the lake. We love how the colors reflect off the water and hearing everyone “Ooooh and Ahhhh” at the brilliant explosions in the sky, makes us smile. Happy Independence Day, Daydreamers! Tumblr
